text: Hagi antahiho, ugagota pristi ne' Amaria'a maka zama Ra Anumzamofonte'ma hanaza zantera kegava hugahie. Hagi Ismaeli nemofo Zebadaia'a Juda vahe'mokizmi rankva mani'neno maka keagama kini netegama erita esazana refko hugahie. Hagi Livae naga'mo'za eri'za vaheka'arami mani'neza kagri eri'zana erigahaze. Hagi hankavetita eri'zana e'nerinkeno, Ra Anumzamo'a fatgoma hu'za eri'zama erisaza naga'ene manigahie.
